018package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.rest.model;
019
020import static org.apache.hadoop.hbase.rest.model.CellModel.MAGIC_LENGTH;
021
022import java.io.IOException;
023import java.io.Serializable;
024import java.util.ArrayList;
025import java.util.List;
026import javax.xml.bind.annotation.XmlAccessType;
027import javax.xml.bind.annotation.XmlAccessorType;
028import javax.xml.bind.annotation.XmlElement;
029import javax.xml.bind.annotation.XmlRootElement;
030import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HConstants;
031import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.rest.ProtobufMessageHandler;
032import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.rest.RestUtil;
033import org.apache.yetus.audience.InterfaceAudience;
034
035import org.apache.hbase.thirdparty.com.google.protobuf.CodedInputStream;
036import org.apache.hbase.thirdparty.com.google.protobuf.Message;
037import org.apache.hbase.thirdparty.com.google.protobuf.UnsafeByteOperations;
038
039import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.shaded.rest.protobuf.generated.CellMessage.Cell;
040import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.shaded.rest.protobuf.generated.CellSetMessage.CellSet;
041
042/**
043 * Representation of a grouping of cells. May contain cells from more than one row. Encapsulates
044 * RowModel and CellModel models.
045 *
046 * <pre>
047 * &lt;complexType name="CellSet"&gt;
048 *   &lt;sequence&gt;
049 *     &lt;element name="row" type="tns:Row" maxOccurs="unbounded"
050 *       minOccurs="1"&gt;&lt;/element&gt;
051 *   &lt;/sequence&gt;
052 * &lt;/complexType&gt;
053 *
054 * &lt;complexType name="Row"&gt;
055 *   &lt;sequence&gt;
056 *     &lt;element name="key" type="base64Binary"&gt;&lt;/element&gt;
057 *     &lt;element name="cell" type="tns:Cell"
058 *       maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="1"&gt;&lt;/element&gt;
059 *   &lt;/sequence&gt;
060 * &lt;/complexType&gt;
061 *
062 * &lt;complexType name="Cell"&gt;
063 *   &lt;sequence&gt;
064 *     &lt;element name="value" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"&gt;
065 *       &lt;simpleType&gt;
066 *         &lt;restriction base="base64Binary"/&gt;
067 *       &lt;/simpleType&gt;
068 *     &lt;/element&gt;
069 *   &lt;/sequence&gt;
070 *   &lt;attribute name="column" type="base64Binary" /&gt;
071 *   &lt;attribute name="timestamp" type="int" /&gt;
072 * &lt;/complexType&gt;
073 * </pre>
074 */
075@XmlRootElement(name = "CellSet")
076@XmlAccessorType(XmlAccessType.NONE)
077@InterfaceAudience.Private
078public class CellSetModel implements Serializable, ProtobufMessageHandler {
079  private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
080
081  @XmlElement(name = "Row")
082  private List<RowModel> rows;
083
084  /**
085   * Constructor
086   */
087  public CellSetModel() {
088    this.rows = new ArrayList<>();
089  }
090
091  /**
092   * @param rows the rows
093   */
094  public CellSetModel(List<RowModel> rows) {
095    super();
096    this.rows = rows;
097  }
098
099  /**
100   * Add a row to this cell set
101   * @param row the row
102   */
103  public void addRow(RowModel row) {
104    rows.add(row);
105  }
106
107  /** Returns the rows */
108  public List<RowModel> getRows() {
109    return rows;
110  }
111
112  @Override
113  public Message messageFromObject() {
114    CellSet.Builder builder = CellSet.newBuilder();
115    for (RowModel row : getRows()) {
116      CellSet.Row.Builder rowBuilder = CellSet.Row.newBuilder();
117      if (row.getKeyLength() == MAGIC_LENGTH) {
118        rowBuilder.setKey(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(row.getKey()));
119      } else {
120        rowBuilder.setKey(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(row.getKeyArray(), row.getKeyOffset(),
121          row.getKeyLength()));
122      }
123      for (CellModel cell : row.getCells()) {
124        Cell.Builder cellBuilder = Cell.newBuilder();
125        cellBuilder.setColumn(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(cell.getColumn()));
126        if (cell.getValueLength() == MAGIC_LENGTH) {
127          cellBuilder.setData(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(cell.getValue()));
128        } else {
129          cellBuilder.setData(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(cell.getValueArray(),
130            cell.getValueOffset(), cell.getValueLength()));
131        }
132        if (cell.hasUserTimestamp()) {
133          cellBuilder.setTimestamp(cell.getTimestamp());
134        }
135        rowBuilder.addValues(cellBuilder);
136      }
137      builder.addRows(rowBuilder);
138    }
139    return builder.build();
140  }
141
142  @Override
143  public ProtobufMessageHandler getObjectFromMessage(CodedInputStream cis) throws IOException {
144    CellSet.Builder builder = CellSet.newBuilder();
145    RestUtil.mergeFrom(builder, cis);
146    for (CellSet.Row row : builder.getRowsList()) {
147      RowModel rowModel = new RowModel(row.getKey().toByteArray());
148      for (Cell cell : row.getValuesList()) {
149        long timestamp = HConstants.LATEST_TIMESTAMP;
150        if (cell.hasTimestamp()) {
151          timestamp = cell.getTimestamp();
152        }
153        rowModel.addCell(
154          new CellModel(cell.getColumn().toByteArray(), timestamp, cell.getData().toByteArray()));
155      }
156      addRow(rowModel);
157    }
158    return this;
159  }
160}
